channel.title: Food Matiss on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Food Matiss on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: whew. i am so tired.
item.description: I could eat a cow I am so tired. heh. today we went to the art institute and I became a member. whee. now I can go to the art institute in style. heh. after that - anne and I came back to my place and we went to argyle stop on the redline and we had really great vietnamese food. I also met matiss’s friend roger. roger is really very very nice.
